tool_description: Validates patient identity and matches samples to correct patient records using multiple identifiers to prevent sample mix-ups.

patient_id.description: Unique patient identifier from the hospital system

secondary_identifier.description: Additional identifier like social security number or medical record number

error_messages: Patient not found: The provided patient_id does not exist in the system database.
Identity mismatch: Patient name or date of birth does not match the records for the given patient_id.
Invalid date format: Provide date_of_birth in ISO 8601 date-time format.
Duplicate patient records: Multiple patients found with similar identifiers, manual verification required.
usage: Provide patient_id, patient_name, and date_of_birth to verify patient identity. Optionally include secondary_identifier for additional validation. Use before any sample collection activity.

match_status.description: Status of patient matching: VERIFIED, FAILED, or REQUIRES_MANUAL_REVIEW
